forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Thunder possible. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Thunder possible. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 28F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
